marklogic.body:
Absolutely Spot on Stephen, the best you've written so far and echo's exactly what I've been saying on my blog, Facebook groups and Twitter for bloody ages!Â
I'm 100% with you with this outlook and will continue to do so until the last day of the season when we will find out where season 2012/13 will take us.Â
You used some great examples such as the 12 point gap from Utd in December 97/98 go to show how fickle, absent minded and impatient some fans are.Â
I shall be referring my followers and readers to this post if only in the hope that maybe they'll get your drift more than they get mine! Cheers and keep up the good work!Â
